name: Come with Me (Xin)
description:
Come with Me

Come with Me is a two-player cooperative adventure game set in a puzzle-filled magical world. Solve puzzles together by using your special abilities and collect memories to uncover the mystery of the world around you.

When the village plunges into darkness, Com and Mi go on an adventure to bring back the light. Com is strong and bulky whereas Mi is small and agile. You can only complete your adventure by working closely together. Can they get past their differences to work through all the obstacles to save the village?

Credits: Xin YeCreative Director/Art DirectorMarshall (Xiangyu) WangLead EngineerHesh (Yuran) Yan
EngineerMaxton WallerComposerJon BrunsonTechnical Sound DesignerWeston Bell-GeddesUsability/Marketing Qiming LinTechnical Artist Under Development, Release May 2021
